info.name: Niagara Cloud API
info.description:

[https://docs.niagara-community.com/bundle/docNdsApi/page/AboutThisGuideEmsApi-A32C821A.html](https://docs.niagara-community.com/bundle/docNdsApi/page/AboutThisGuideEmsApi-A32C821A.html)
